tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE restaurants (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location GEOGRAPHY,
  cuisine VARCHAR(100),
  rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE restaurants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Restaurants (
    restaurant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restaurant_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restaurant_id) REFERENCES Restaurants(restaurant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Distance (
    distance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restaurant_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (restaurant_id) REFERENCES Restaurants(restaurant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restaurants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  zip_code VARCHAR(20),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  zip_code VARCHAR(20),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE user_location (
  user_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, location_name)
);

CREATE TABLE restaurant_menu (
  restaurant_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  item_name VARCHAR(100),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (restaurant_id, item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  user_id INT,
  restaurant_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, restaurant_id)
);
